The eight powers that qualify a mendican: Clearly seen with right wisdom all conditions as truly impermanent
Clearly seen with right wisdom that sensual pleasures are truly like a pit of glowing coals
The mind slants, slopes, and inclines to seclusion
Well-developed the four kinds of mindfulness meditation
Well-developed the four bases of psychic power
